dmca.title: NetResult DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
NetResult Internal Reference:  TheOpen_NRID174645

Please quote the above TheOpen_NRID174645 reference in all communications
with us regarding this issue.

Audio Visual Infringement

Dear Sirs,

We have noticed that your Web Site, http://tvalertamix.blogspot.com/ is
displaying audiovisual (A/V) content of The Open Championship.

All copyright in The Open A/V content is exclusively owned by The R&A
Championships Limited (The R&A) and or its exclusive production partners. 
As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from The R&A to use this
content, your present use is an infringement of The R&A's rights.  Please
immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your web sites
and confirm to us via email that you have done so.

Please confirm immediately, by return, your undertaking to cease all such
infringements on any and all of your web sites.  


Formal Declaration

I hereby state that The R&A are the owner of the exclusive rights referenced
above and that NetResult is authorised to act on its behalf with respect to
internet monitoring and compliance. 

On behalf of The R&A, I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that
use of the content in the manner complained of is not authorised by The R&A,
its agents, or the law.

I, [redacted] , as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign
this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United
States of America with the additional statement under penalty of perjury
that the information in the notice is accurate.

Please note that nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to
constitute an express or implied waiver of any of The R&A's rights or
remedies, all of which are expressly reserved.

We thank you for your cooperation.
 
Yours faithfully,
 
[redacted]

NetResult Solutions Limited
PO BOX [redacted]
London
SW15[redacted]
United Kingdom

Tel: +44 (0)[redacted]
